context_bundle.summary: Vault Advanced covers enterprise features including high availability, replication, performance standbys, and advanced secrets engines

onboarding.quick_start: vault operator init -key-shares=5 -key-threshold=3 && vault operator unseal <unseal_key1> && vault login <root_token>
common_patterns: HA cluster: 'vault operator raft join https://vault-2:8200' for multi-node setup
Auto-unseal: 'vault write sys/audit/file/file_1 path=/var/log/vault_audit.log' for audit logging
Secrets engine: 'vault secrets enable -path=pki pki' and 'vault write pki/root/generate/internal common_name=example.com'
Policy management: 'vault policy write admin admin.hcl' with path 'sys/*' capabilities
Kubernetes auth: 'vault auth enable kubernetes' and 'vault write auth/kubernetes/config kubernetes_host=https://kubernetes.default.svc:443'
Transit encryption: 'vault write transit/keys/my-key type=rsa-2048' and 'vault write transit/encrypt/my-key plaintext=$(base64 <<< 'secret data')'
known_errors: Sealed after restart: 'vault operator unseal' with threshold keys and consider auto-unseal configuration
Auth method denied: 'vault read auth/kubernetes/role/my-role' and verify service account token and bound_service_account_names
Certificate expired: 'vault pki issue' with proper TTL and 'vault pki tidy' to clean up expired certificates
Storage backend error: 'vault operator migrate -config=vault.hcl' when migrating storage backends
Permission denied: 'vault token capabilities <token> <path>' to debug policy issues and 'vault policy read <policy_name>'
